Create full API specifications for ALL endpoints in the /usernames resource.

Application Context: A simple single-page application that stores and displays a list of usernames. The application will not require user authentication and will have a visually appealing design.

Endpoints to specify:

1. Endpoint: Get Usernames
   Method: GET
   Path: /api/usernames
   Description: Retrieve the list of stored usernames
   Used by pages: Username List Page
2. Endpoint: Add Username
   Method: POST
   Path: /api/usernames
   Description: Add a new username to the list
   Used by pages: Username List Page
3. Endpoint: Check Username Availability
   Method: POST
   Path: /api/usernames/check
   Description: Validate if a username is available for addition
   Used by pages: Username List Page
4. Endpoint: Check Username Availability
   Method: GET
   Path: /api/usernames/availability
   Description: Check if a username is already in the list
   Used by pages: Username List Page

Return a JSON array with specifications for each endpoint in order:
[
  {"request_body": "describe parameters/body for endpoint 1", "response": "describe response structure for endpoint 1"},
  {"request_body": "describe parameters/body for endpoint 2", "response": "describe response structure for endpoint 2"},
  ...
]

JSON array only:
